title: LiveEdutvICO
author: LiveEdutvICO
content: Hello #EducationEcosystem Fam Due to the FTX problem that caused many losses in market, we wish to giveaway aLedger and Trezor hardware walletTask : => Tweet about $LEDU in your own words and say what you like about it with the hashtags #EducationEcosystem #ledu #crypto. (Hashtags are compulsory). =>Visit https://discord.gg/cPfVh4QKzz to join the discord server and visit the giveaway channel. => Post a screenshot of your tweet showing your proof in the giveaway channel. https://twitter.com/eduecosystem1/status/1602315853374148608?s=20&t=4wraomLJkNgwV9P820cMXw

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: You want to giveaway ledger and trezor hardware yet you didn't bother to pay the bm who help promote your campaign here in the forum to keep a good reputation. If you are that generous you should try and resolve that issue first. And why do I feel there is more to this free hardware charade  i doubt this gesture will give your project the attention you are trying so hard to gain. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5265832.msg56078765#msg56078765

comments.author: MaticRollorg1
comments.body: Quote from: LiveEdutvICO on December 12, 2022, 03:26:09 PMHello #EducationEcosystem Fam Due to the FTX problem that caused many losses in market, we wish to giveaway aLedger and Trezor hardware walletTask : => Tweet about $LEDU in your own words and say what you like about it with the hashtags #EducationEcosystem #ledu #crypto. (Hashtags are compulsory). =>Visit https://discord.gg/cPfVh4QKzz to join the discord server and visit the giveaway channel. => Post a screenshot of your tweet showing your proof in the giveaway channel. https://twitter.com/eduecosystem1/status/1602315853374148608?s=20&t=4wraomLJkNgwV9P820cMXwLol, you giveaway hardware wallets with backdoor ?

comments.author: Guddyjack
comments.body: If you have not been lucky to win in a giveaway from Education Ecosystem before, its pretty bad. EE has been giving out numerous benefits as always promised and i am proud to be one of the participant and won. #EE the best.

comments.author: jacky2022
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on December 12, 2022, 03:40:55 PMYou want to giveaway ledger and trezor hardware yet you didn't bother to pay the bm who help promote your campaign here in the forum to keep a good reputation. If you are that generous you should try and resolve that issue first. And why do I feel there is more to this free hardware charade  i doubt this gesture will give your project the attention you are trying so hard to gain. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5265832.msg56078765#msg56078765Education Ecosyetm has no issue giving out what was promised to its community. Follow Education Ecosystem and enjoy its numerous giveaway all through.
